news.content:
We've opened up a two-way chat on Telegram for the ThreeFold community! üåç

You can join here ‚Äì see you there!

‚úÖ Be kind and respectful of other members. Keep discussions to the grid, its use cases, the tech, farming, deploying, etc.

üö´ No token price discussion, speculation, shilling nor hyping. No impersonation of any members or admins. No referral links, spamming, nor advertising (including in username)
